simple_extrude.description: Simple rectangular face extrusion (10x10mm to 10mm height)

boolean_union.description: Boolean union of two overlapping 10mm cubes

fillet_10_edges.description: Fillet operation on up to 10 edges with 1mm radius

full_rebuild.description: Full model rebuild: box + extrude + boolean + fillet

_metadata.description: Performance baselines for MashCAD Sprint 1 Regression Gate
notes: target_ms: Expected performance under normal conditions
max_ms: Maximum acceptable time before failure
Regression is flagged when >20% over target_ms
Failure is flagged when over max_ms or operation errors
